00024 #include "Parabola.hpp"
00025 #include "util/unit.hpp"
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <iterator>
00028 #include <iomanip>
00029 #include <cmath>
00030 #include <limits>
00031 
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 using namespace pwiz::util;
00035 using namespace pwiz::math;
00036 
00037 
00038 ostream* os_ = 0;
00039 double epsilon_ = numeric_limits<double>::epsilon();
00040 
00041 
00042 void testBasic()
00043 {
00044     if (os_) *os_ << "***************************\n";
00045     if (os_) *os_ << "testBasic()\n";
00046     Parabola p(2, 3, 4);
00047     unit_assert_equal(p(5), 69, epsilon_);
00048     p.coefficients()[0] = 3;
00049     unit_assert_equal(p(5), 94, epsilon_);
00050     if (os_) *os_ << "testBasic(): success\n";
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 void testExactFit()
00055 {
00056     if (os_) *os_ << "***************************\n";
00057     if (os_) *os_ << "testExactFit()\n";
00058 
00059     vector< pair<double,double> > samples;
00060     samples.push_back(make_pair(1,1));
00061     samples.push_back(make_pair(2,3));
00062     samples.push_back(make_pair(3,9));
00063 
00064     const Parabola p(samples);
00065 
00066     if (os_) *os_ << p << endl;
00067     if (os_) *os_ << "center: (" << p.center() << ", " << p(p.center()) << ")\n";
00068 
00069     const vector<double>& a = p.coefficients();
00070 
00071     unit_assert_equal(a[0], 2, epsilon_*10);
00072     unit_assert_equal(a[1], -4, epsilon_*10);
00073 
00074     unit_assert_equal(a[2], 3, epsilon_*5);
00075     unit_assert_equal(p.center(), 1, epsilon_);
00076     unit_assert_equal(p(p.center()), 1, epsilon_*10);
00077     unit_assert_equal(p(0), 3, epsilon_*5);
00078 
00079     if (os_) *os_ << "testExactFit(): success\n";
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 void testLeastSquares()
00084 {
00085     if (os_) *os_ << "***************************\n";
00086     if (os_) *os_ << "testLeastSquares()\n";
00087 
00088     vector< pair<double,double> > samples;
00089     samples.push_back(make_pair(1,1));
00090     samples.push_back(make_pair(2,3));
00091     samples.push_back(make_pair(3,9));
00092     samples.push_back(make_pair(0,3));
00093     samples.push_back(make_pair(-1,9));
00094 
00095     const Parabola p(samples);
00096 
00097     if (os_) *os_ << p << endl;
00098     if (os_) *os_ << "center: (" << p.center() << ", " << p(p.center()) << ")\n";
00099 
00100     const vector<double>& a = p.coefficients();
00101 
00102     unit_assert_equal(a[0], 2, epsilon_*10);
00103     unit_assert_equal(a[1], -4, epsilon_*100);
00104     unit_assert_equal(a[2], 3, epsilon_*10);
00105     unit_assert_equal(p.center(), 1, epsilon_*10);
00106     unit_assert_equal(p(p.center()), 1, epsilon_*100);
00107     unit_assert_equal(p(0), 3, epsilon_*10);
00108 
00109     if (os_) *os_ << "testLeastSquares(): success\n";
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 void testWeightedLeastSquares()
00114 {
00115     if (os_) *os_ << "***************************\n";
00116     if (os_) *os_ << "testWeightedLeastSquares()\n";
00117 
00118     // fit to f(x) = 1/sqrt(x*x+1)
00119 
00120     // samples ( x, 1/(f(x)*f(x)) ), i.e. (x, x*x+1)
00121     vector< pair<double,double> > samples;
00122     samples.push_back(make_pair(0,1));
00123     samples.push_back(make_pair(1,2));
00124     samples.push_back(make_pair(2,5));
00125     samples.push_back(make_pair(-3,10));
00126     samples.push_back(make_pair(-4,17));
00127 
00128     // weights w = (y^6)/4 => fits data to 1/sqrt(a[0]x^2 + a[1]x + a[2])
00129     vector<double> weights;
00130     for (unsigned int i=0; i<samples.size(); i++)
00131     {
00132         double y = samples[i].second;
00133         weights.push_back(pow(y,6)/4);
00134     }
00135 
00136     if (os_)
00137     {
00138         *os_ << "weights: ";
00139         copy(weights.begin(), weights.end(), ostream_iterator<double>(*os_, " " ));
00140     }
00141 
00142     const Parabola p(samples, weights);
00143 
00144     if (os_) *os_ << p << endl;
00145     if (os_) *os_ << "center: (" << p.center() << ", " << p(p.center()) << ")\n";
00146 
00147     if (os_)
00148     {
00149         *os_ << "coefficients: " << setprecision(14);
00150         copy(p.coefficients().begin(), p.coefficients().end(), ostream_iterator<double>(*os_, " "));
00151         *os_ << endl;
00152     }
00153 
00154     unit_assert_equal(p.coefficients()[0], 1, epsilon_*1000);
00155     unit_assert_equal(p.coefficients()[1], 0, epsilon_*10e4);
00156     unit_assert_equal(p.coefficients()[2], 1, epsilon_*10e4);
00157     if (os_) *os_ << "testWeightedLeastSquares(): success\n";
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00162 {
00163     try
00164     {
00165         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00166         if (os_) *os_ << "ParabolaTest\n";
00167         testBasic();
00168         testExactFit();
00169         testLeastSquares();
00170         testWeightedLeastSquares();
00171         return 0;
00172     }
00173     catch (exception &e)
00174     {
00175         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00176         return 1;
00177     }
00178 }
